articles.title: Energy crisis: National Grid warns of winter power shortage and 'significant price spikes' - Daily Express
articles.description: AN ENERGY crisis currently striking Europe poses the possibility of winter power shortages and 'significant price spikes,' National Grid has warned.

articles.title: That's why Britain voted Brexit! Macron pleads for French 'sovereignty' amid EU crisis - Daily Express
articles.description: FRENCH PRESIDENT Emmanuel Macron appeared to emulate Brexiteers when he pleaded for France to become 'more green and more sovereign' as the European Union (EU) faces an unprecedented gas crisis.
